title: OgNasty
author: OgNasty
content: Please be careful. It has been a few years since I’ve been informed that someone is trying to use my name to scam on telegram but it appears they are back. I do not do business of any kind outside this site using the name OgNasty so if you ever see someone on Telegram or anywhere else using that name, know they are a scammer. Be careful. Quote from: Personal MessagesCan you confirm that you are the one talking to me on telegram?

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: People are just stupid at times if they are scammed this way. Anyone that want to contact you on telegram or any other social place or media should first make sure that he talks with you here on this forum. It is you that supposed to tell them here to contact you on other social places. Even also here, if it is something related to business and money, something like signing a message with bitcoin old address on this forum should first be used to know that you are dealing with the real person and not a compromised account.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: OG does not need to scam on Telegram.   He is fully protected here to make as many alts as he wants to scam.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 14, 2023, 05:58:44 PMOG does not need to scam on Telegram.   He is fully protected here to make as many alts as he wants to scam.LOL... I see you are back wreaking havoc again, or trying. Are you doing ok? HMU on the "not-telegram" if you get a chance.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: It's very easy for someone to change their username on telegram after scamming their targeted client but the authenticity is for them to get you inboxed over here to confirm if you are the one on telegram initiating business with them. I don't usually reply to any DM on telegram if I didn't give you my ID or discuss about anything, when I get any random messages I block such person straight to avoid long conversation to that would lead to issues.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Knowing OG very well, this is something he would do.Does he care about anyone losing coins?  Nope.  He cares only about his reputation so he can steal more.   By making this announcement he is free to use his name to scam on Telegram, and then deny any involvement.
